languages.text: "К нам присоединил{mf|ся|ась} втор{mf|ой|ая} кандидат{mf||ка}". {n}Сухой женский голос и жгучее ощущение, что на вас смотрят, заставляет вас перевести взгляд на Теодору. {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} взирает на вас в упор, и взор ее подобен ей самой — хищен и тяжеловесен.{/n} "{name}, подойди и дай мне ответ".

traits.locale_text: "К нам присоединил{mf|ся|ась} втор{mf|ой|ая} кандидат{mf||ка}". {n}Сухой женский голос и жгучее ощущение, что на вас смотрят, заставляет вас перевести взгляд на Теодору. {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} взирает на вас в упор, и взор ее подобен ей самой — хищен и тяжеловесен.{/n} "{name}, подойди и дай мне ответ".

languages.text: "Our second candidate has joined us." {n}The dry female voice and the powerful feeling of being watched force you to look at Theodora. The {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is looking straight at you, and her gaze, like herself, is predatory and oppressive.{/n} "{name}, approach and give me your answer."
languages.original_text: "К нам присоединил{mf|ся|ась} втор{mf|ой|ая} кандидат{mf||ка}". {n}Сухой женский голос и жгучее ощущение, что на вас смотрят, заставляет вас перевести взгляд на Теодору. {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} взирает на вас в упор, и взор ее подобен ей самой — хищен и тяжеловесен.{/n} "{name}, подойди и дай мне ответ".

traits.locale_text: "Our second candidate has joined us." {n}The dry female voice and the strong feeling of being watched force you to look at Theodora. The {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is looking straight at you, and her gaze, like herself, is predatory and oppressive.{/n} "{name}, approach and give me your answer."

The {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is looking straight at you, and her gaze, like herself, is predatory and oppressive.{/n} "{name}, approach and give me your answer."

"Our second candidate has joined us." {n}The dry female voice and the powerful feeling of being watched force you to look at Theodora. The {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is looking straight at you, and her gaze, like herself, is predatory and oppressive.{/n} "{name}, approach and give me your answer."

languages.text: “我们的第二位候选人已经到了。”{n}你听到了干巴巴的女性声音，感到了灼热的目光，不得不将注意力转向西奥多拉。这位{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}此刻正直视着你。她的目光就像她本人一样，充满了掠夺感与压迫感。{/n}“过来吧，{name}，告诉我你的答案。”
languages.original_text: "Our second candidate has joined us." {n}The dry female voice and the powerful feeling of being watched force you to look at Theodora. The {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is looking straight at you, and her gaze, like herself, is predatory and oppressive.{/n} "{name}, approach and give me your answer."

traits.locale_text: “我们的第二位候选人已经到了。”{n}你听到了干巴巴的女性声音，感到了灼热的目光，不得不将注意力转向西奥多拉。这位{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}此刻正直视着你。她的目光就像她本人一样，充满了掠夺感与压迫感。{/n}“过来吧，{name}，告诉我你的答案。”

languages.text: «Nuestr{mf|o|a} segund{mf|o|a} candidat{mf|o|a} ha llegado». {n}La seca voz de la mujer te obliga a mirar a Theodora. La {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} te mira. Su mirada es como ella: depredadora y opresiva.{/n} «{name}, acércate y responde».
languages.original_text: "Our second candidate has joined us." {n}The dry female voice and the powerful feeling of being watched force you to look at Theodora. The {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is looking straight at you, and her gaze, like herself, is predatory and oppressive.{/n} "{name}, approach and give me your answer."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestr{mf|o|a} segund{mf|o|a} candidat{mf|o|a} ha llegado». {n}La seca voz de la mujer te obliga a mirar a Theodora. La {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} te mira. Su mirada es como ella: depredadora y opresiva.{/n} «{name}, acércate y responde».

languages.text: 「第二候補者が来た」{n}乾いた女性の声と、見られているという力強い感覚が、あなたの目をシオドーラに釘付けにする。{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}は、あなたをまっすぐに見つめており、その視線は彼女の人となりと同様に略奪的で抑圧的だ。{/n}「{name}、こちらに来て私に答えを」
languages.original_text: "Our second candidate has joined us." {n}The dry female voice and the powerful feeling of being watched force you to look at Theodora. The {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is looking straight at you, and her gaze, like herself, is predatory and oppressive.{/n} "{name}, approach and give me your answer."

traits.locale_text: 「第二候補者が来ました」{n}乾いた女性の声と、見られているという力強い感覚が、あなたの目をテオドラに釘付けにする。{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}はあなたをまっすぐに見つめており、その視線は彼女の人となりと同様に略奪的で抑圧的だ。{/n}「{name}、こちらに来て私に答えてください」
「第二候補者が来た」{n}乾いた女性の声と、見られているという力強い感覚が、あなたの目をシオドーラに釘付けにする。{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}は、あなたをまっすぐに見つめており、その視線は彼女の人となりと同様に略奪的で抑圧的だ。{/n}「{name}、こちらに来て私に答えを」

languages.text: « Mais voilà notre deuxième {mf|candidat|candidate}. » {n}Son ton sec et l'intense sensation d'être {mf|observé|observée} vous forcent à lever les yeux vers Théodora. La {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g} vous fixe longuement d'un regard à son image, prédateur et oppressant.{/n} « Approchez, {name}, et répondez-moi. »
languages.original_text: "Our second candidate has joined us." {n}The dry female voice and the powerful feeling of being watched force you to look at Theodora. The {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is looking straight at you, and her gaze, like herself, is predatory and oppressive.{/n} "{name}, approach and give me your answer."

traits.locale_text: « Mais voilà notre deuxième {mf|candidat|candidate}. » {n}Son ton sec et l'intense sensation d'être {mf|observé|observée} vous forcent à lever les yeux vers Théodora. La {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g} vous fixe longuement d'un regard à son image, prédateur et oppressant.{/n} « Approchez, {name}, et répondez-moi. »

languages.text: "Unser zweiter Kandidat ist zu uns gestoßen." {n}Die nüchterne weibliche Stimme und das überwältigende Gefühl, beobachtet zu werden, zwingen dich, Theodora anzusehen. Die {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlerin{/g} blickt dich direkt an, und auch das hat etwas Raubtierhaftes und Unterdrückendes.{/n} "{name}, tretet näher und gebt mir Eure Antwort."
languages.original_text: "Our second candidate has joined us." {n}The dry female voice and the powerful feeling of being watched force you to look at Theodora. The {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is looking straight at you, and her gaze, like herself, is predatory and oppressive.{/n} "{name}, approach and give me your answer."

traits.locale_text: "Unser zweiter Kandidat ist zu uns gestoßen." {n}Die nüchterne weibliche Stimme und das überwältigende Gefühl, beobachtet zu werden, zwingen dich, Theodora anzusehen. Die {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlerin{/g} blickt dich direkt an, und auch das hat etwas Raubtierhaftes und Unterdrückendes.{/n} "{name}, tretet näher und gebt mir Eure Antwort."

languages.text: "İkinci adayımız da bize katıldı." {n}Kadının kuru sesi ve gözlerin üstünde olduğuna dair o baskın hissiyat seni Theodora'ya bakmaya zorluyor. {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} doğrudan sana bakıyor. Üstüne diktiği gözleri tıpkı kendisi gibi yırtıcı ve sindirici.{/n} "{name}, yaklaş ve cevabını ver."
languages.original_text: "Our second candidate has joined us." {n}The dry female voice and the powerful feeling of being watched force you to look at Theodora. The {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} is looking straight at you, and her gaze, like herself, is predatory and oppressive.{/n} "{name}, approach and give me your answer."

Üstüne diktiği gözleri tıpkı kendisi gibi yırtıcı ve sindirici.{/n} "{name}, yaklaş ve cevabını ver."

The Rogue Trader is looking straight at you, and her gaze, like herself, is predatory and oppressive.{/n} ", approach and give me your answer."
